name: Squirtle

evolution.description: Squirtle can evolve into Wartortle at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tiny Turtle Pokémon. Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: In rainy conditions, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency bonus at the end of each of its turns.
